body_html:
Four options:

  1. Don't use queues; batch input yourself each iteration.
  2. Run parallel training threads in parallel; while one is reading another is training
  3. Modify a queue to use GPU; not an impossible task but also not fun
  4. Improve the performance of existing queues by optimizing the c++ code

TensorArrays are per step objects, thus not useful for this case

Improve the performance of existing queues by optimizing the c++ code

TensorArrays are per step objects, thus not useful for this case
body:
Four options:

1. Don't use queues; batch input yourself each iteration.
2. Run parallel training threads in parallel; while one is reading another is training
3.  Modify a queue to use GPU; not an impossible task but also not fun
4. Improve the performance of existing queues by optimizing the c++ code

TensorArrays are per step objects, thus not useful for this case
